医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
治疗痴呆症的抗精神病药物与严重不良后果风险升高相关一项发表的研究发现，与不使用抗精神病药物相比，痴呆症患者使用抗精神病药物会增加多种严重不良后果的风险，包括中风、血栓、心脏病、心力衰竭、骨折、肺炎和急性肾损伤今天由英国医学杂志报道。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240417/Antipsychotics-for-dementia-linked-with-elevated-risks-of-serious-adverse-outcomes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240417/Antipsychotics-for-dementia-linked-with-elevated-risks-of-serious-adverse-outcomes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d0ee977d-eec6-4f15-9455-10ec1766eaaf Wed, 17 Apr 2024 22:12:36 -0400 Antipsychotics for dementia associated with elevated risks of serious adverse outcomes
索尔克科学家解释 CBN 如何保护大脑免受衰老和神经退行性变65 岁以上的人中，每 10 个人中就有 1 人患有与年龄相关的神经系统疾病，如阿尔茨海默氏症或帕金森氏症，但针对这一人群的治疗选择仍然很少。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240417/Salk-scientists-explain-how-CBN-protects-the-brain-against-aging-and-neurodegenesis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240417/Salk-scientists-explain-how-CBN-protects-the-brain-against-aging-and-neurodegenesis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=639b0e4d-9fe5-4494-872c-09c9bcaab9dd Wed, 17 Apr 2024 22:09:18 -0400 Salk scientists explain how CBN protects the brain against aging and neurodegeneration
3 期试验显示辅助治疗对肾癌患者的总体生存有益五十年来首次，一项 3 期随机安慰剂对照试验的结果显示，肾癌患者的辅助治疗可提高总体生存率。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240417/Phase-3-trial-shows-overall-survival-benefit-from-adjuvant-therapy-in-kidney-cancer-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240417/Phase-3-trial-shows-overall-survival-benefit-from-adjuvant-therapy-in-kidney-cancer-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=572df418-d289-4832-a3a1-5925ca7db102 Wed, 17 Apr 2024 21:59:32 -0400 Phase 3 trial shows overall survival benefit from adjuvant therapy in kidney cancer patients
新疫苗有望针对 SARS-CoV-2 和其他 sarbeco 病毒提供广泛的保护佐治亚理工学院和威斯康星大学的研究人员创造了一种广谱疫苗，能够防御各种 SARS-CoV-2 变种和相关的蝙蝠冠状病毒。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240417/New-vaccine-promises-broad-protection-against-SARS-CoV-2-and-other-sarbecoviruses.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240417/New-vaccine-promises-broad-protection-against-SARS-CoV-2-and-other-sarbecoviruses.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5996ed22-0901-42ef-9763-d26471667205 Wed, 17 Apr 2024 20:41:00 -0400 New vaccine promises broad protection against SARS-CoV-2 and other sarbecoviruses
双向孟德尔随机化揭示血浆代谢物与心脏病发作风险之间的联系心肌梗塞，通常称为心脏病发作，是全世界死亡的主要原因。称为血浆代谢物的生物标志物可能在心肌梗死涉及的生理途径中发挥关键作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240417/Bi Direction-Mendelian-randomization-uncovers-link- Between-plasma-metabolites-and-heart-attack-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240417/Bi Direction-Mendelian-randomization-uncovers-link- Between-plasma-metabolites-and-heart-attack-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1b0ef9ca-8236-4f2e-8e8b-59cf2759eb52 Wed, 17 Apr 2024 12:50:42 -0400 Bidirectional Mendelian randomization uncovers link between plasma metabolites and heart attack risk
局部晚期前列腺癌的联合化学激素疗法可延长 PSA 水平的控制官方期刊《泌尿学杂志》四月号上的一项研究报告称，对于局部晚期前列腺癌患者，与单独使用激素疗法相比，化疗和激素疗法联合治疗可以更好地控制前列腺特异性抗原 (PSA) 水平美国泌尿外科协会。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240417/Combined-chemohormonal-therapy-for-locally-advanced-prostate-cancer-offers-extended-control-of-PSA-levels.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240417/Combined-chemohormonal-therapy-for-locally-advanced-prostate-cancer-offers-extended-control-of-PSA-levels.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f97bff8b-fc12-4a10-ac5a-ab5fee87424a Wed, 17 Apr 2024 12:43:55 -0400 Combined chemohormonal therapy for locally advanced prostate cancer offers extended control of PSA levels
在大流行期间，五分之一的加拿大老年糖尿病患者出现功能限制研究人员发现，大约五分之一患有糖尿病且大流行前没有功能限制的加拿大老年人在 COVID-19 大流行期间首次出现功能限制。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240417/1-in-5-older-Canadian-adults-with-diabetes-development-function-limitations-during-the-pandemic.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240417/1-in-5-older-Canadian-adults-with-diabetes-development-function-limitations-during-the-pandemic.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a3cc493f-46b1-4f8a-9ff0-9630ba3e455c Wed, 17 Apr 2024 12:37:34 -0400 1 in 5 older Canadian adults with diabetes developed functional limitations during the pandemic
过度使用互联网加上睡眠不足、锻炼不足与青少年逃学和缺课有关档案馆在线发表的研究发现，在青少年中花费太多时间到强迫性的程度，忽视其他必要的活动，加上睡眠或锻炼不足，与青少年因病而逃学和缺课的风险增加有关童年时期的疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240417/Excessive-internet-use-plus-lack-of-sleep-exercise-linked-to-teen-truancy-and-school-absence.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240417/Excessive-internet-use-plus-lack-of-sleep-exercise-linked-to-teen-truancy-and-school-absence.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=19fad933-c645-4dde-bc2c-22f5d69bdfea Wed, 17 Apr 2024 12:32:20 -0400 Excessive internet use plus lack of sleep, exercise linked to teen truancy and school absence
新研究揭示了大学生种族与心理健康耻辱之间的关系纽约理工学院咨询研究员的一项新研究揭示了种族与心理健康耻辱之间的关系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240417/New-study-sheds-light-on-the-relationship- Between-race-and-mental-health-stigma-in-college-students.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240417/New-study-sheds-light-on-the-relationship- Between-race-and-mental-health-stigma-in-college-students.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9f3d44a8-120a-4613-99c1-47dae901ab19 Wed, 17 Apr 2024 12:22:50 -0400 New study sheds light on the relationship between race and mental health stigma in college students
近十年来，房颤的终生风险上升至近 31%丹麦国家队列中从 45 岁开始的房颤及其并发症的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240417/Lifetime-risk-of-atrial-fibrillation-rises-to-nearly-3125-in-recent-decade.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240417/Lifetime-risk-of-atrial-fibrillation-rises-to-nearly-3125-in-recent-decade.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f3073da7-68d1-4d79-97be-5cfcce5d288c Wed, 17 Apr 2024 07:19:00 -0400 Lifetime risk of atrial fibrillation rises to nearly 31% in recent decade
